attributes.action: Enforce a standard and affordable price for free-from ranges at supermarkets.
attributes.additional_details:
Enforce a set affordable price of free-from ranges at all major supermarkets, including ASDA, Tesco, Sainsburys and Morrisons.

This is to meet the needs of people who have long-term medical conditions, including diabetes, gluten-intolerance, lactose-intolerance and also cultural determined specific dietary requirements.
